sentences.en: "What a marvelous carving!" the starving harvester in vest said.
sentences.cn: “好一件神奇的雕刻！”挨饿的穿着背心的收割者说。

sentences.en: Despite the heat, he wore a dark business suit complete with vest.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气闷热, 他还是穿了一套深色的普通衣服,并配上一件背心.

sentences.en: He takes off his coat to reveal a bright red vest.
sentences.cn: 他脱下上衣,露出一件鲜红的马甲.

sentences.en: He was dripping with sweat, his vest sticking to his torso.
sentences.cn: 他汗流如注, 背心全贴在身上了.

sentences.en: He wore a woollen vest beneath his shirt.
sentences.cn: 他衬衫里面穿着一件羊毛背心.

sentences.en: His trousers were too short and his coat and vest too loose.
sentences.cn: 他的裤子太短,外套和背心又太肥大.

sentences.en: Pull it off, put tack and paper in vest pocket.
sentences.cn: 把它撕下来连大头针一起放进背心口袋里.

sentences.en: She was dressed only in a vest and underpants.
sentences.cn: 她只穿了一件汗衫和一条短裤.

sentences.en: The basic forms of jacket, vest, and breeches developed slowly.
sentences.cn: 上衣 、 背心 、 马裤的基本式样发展很缓慢.

sentences.en: The man scarcely looked at him, fished in his vest pocket and took out a dime.
sentences.cn: 这人看也不看他一眼, 伸手去摸背心口袋,掏出一枚1角银币.

sentences.en: The policeman survived because of his bulletproof vest.
sentences.cn: 警察因穿有防弹背心而幸免于难.

sentences.en: There were some loose bills in his vest pocket -- greenbacks.
sentences.cn: 在他的西装背心口袋里有些零碎票子 -- 绿颜色的美钞.

sentences.en: You'd better wear a vest under a coat.
sentences.cn: 你最好把马甲穿在上衣里面.

words.tran_cn: 既定的；穿着衣服（尤指祭服）的；（美）带背心的（指西服套装）
（作礼拜时教士的）法衣；官服；祭坛布；礼服；衣服
（财产、权利等）授予（vest的过去式和过去分词）；使穿衣服

phrases.phrase: play (或keep)one's cards close to one's vest

trans.tran_cn: 马甲，防护衣，内衣，（印有运动员编号的）运动背心
trans.tran_en: a piece of underwear without sleeves that you wear on the top half of your body
